name: EXHALA
description:
(CW: Implied gore and some minor flashing images.)

Exhala was an MMORPG created in 2004 by the developer RemVision. It was relatively unpopular upon its release due to its very few features, unclear objectives, and almost nonexistent advertising. While the already very small player base has been almost completely inactive for a number of years, one server has still remained available. Six players try to explore it together many years later.

WASD - Move

Shift - Teleport (Only in Certain Areas)

Enter - Interact (Rare)

Version 1.0 | Will likely be updated/reuploaded at some point in the future.

Made with the fantastic MV3D Plugin by Cutievirus https://cutievirus.itch.io/
